revised_title: Morphology and Adaptations in the Lucinacea (Eulamellibranchia)
tldr: The author studied the morphology and adaptations of the Lucinacea (Eulamellibranchia), a group of bivalve mollusks, focusing on their feeding, respiratory, and cleansing currents. They analyzed the variations in the body, gills, palps, stomach, and digestive diverticula of different species and discussed the probable course of evolution within the group.
